content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata>  <idinfo>   <citation>    <citeinfo>     <origin>           Coral Reef Ecosystem Division (CRED), Pacific Islands Fisheries Science Center (PIFSC), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)         </origin>     <pubdate>           20110225         </pubdate>     <title>           CRED Shallow CTD Profiles; Maro Reef, Northwestern Hawaiian Islands (Papahanaumokuakea Marine National Monument); Cruise: HI0611, Data Date Range: 20060907-20060909 (NODC Accession 0039382).         </title>     <geoform>           tabular digital data         </geoform>     <onlink>           http://www.pifsc.noaa.gov/cred/oceanography.php         </onlink>     <onlink>           http://data.nodc.noaa.gov/accession/0039382         </onlink>    </citeinfo>   </citation>   <descript>    <abstract>         CRED shallow Conductivity-Temperature-Depth (CTD) casts are vertical profiles (max 30 meter depth, downcast only) of temperature, conductivity and pressure.  Data are collected at select nearshore locations, both around islands or banks and within lagoons.  Data processing was performed using Seabird Instrument's SeaSoft SBE Data Processing Software (http://www.seabird.com/software/SBEDataProcforWindows.htm).  Data format is discreet, tabular (formatted, space delimited ASCII) files for each profile, with a full header as provided by SeaSoft.  Raw file extension is HEX, processed file extension is CNV.  The header contains latitude, longitude and other location information, as well as all data processing steps and settings.  All dates and times are UTC. All positions are WGS84 decimal degrees.  Contact Coral Reef Ecosystem Division (CRED), NOAA Pacific Island Fisheries Science Center for more information. http://www.pifsc.noaa.gov/cred/oceanography.php       </abstract>    <purpose>         These data were collected for coral reef ecosystem research.       </purpose>    <supplinf>         18 profiling CTD casts were conducted near Maro Reef, Northwestern Hawaiian Islands (Papahanaumokuakea Marine National Monument) during cruise HI0611 with the following instrument configuration.  Primary CTD Manufacturer: Sea-Bird Electronics, Inc., Primary CTD Model: SBE 19plus SEACAT Profiler CTD with Druck Strain Gauge Pressure Sensor (600m Max Depth), Primary CTD Serial Number: 19P398464818, Primary CTD Specifications: Temperature (Degrees Celsius):  Measurement Range -5 to +35; Initial Accuracy 0.005; Typical Stability 0.0002 per month; Resolution 0.0001; Calibration +1 to +32 (measurement outside these ranges may be at slightly reduced accuracy due to extrapolation errors).  Conductivity (Siemens/meter):  Measurement Range 0 - 9; Initial Accuracy 0.0005; Typical Stability 0.0003 per month; Resolution 0.00005 (most oceanic water; resolves 0.4 ppm in salinity); Calibration 0 to 9 (physical calibration over range 2.6 to 6 S/m, plus zero conductivity (air) measurement outside these ranges may be at slightly reduced accuracy due to extrapolation errors).  Pressure - Strain Gauge Sensor (meters):  Measurement Range 0 to 600; Initial Accuracy 0.6; Typical Stability 0.3 per month; Resolution 0.012; Calibration Ambient pressure to full scale range in 5 steps..  Auxiliary Sensor Volt 0 Manufacturer: WET Labs, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 0 Model: C-Star Transmissometer (RED - 660nm), Auxiliary Sensor Volt 0 Serial Number: CST546PR, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 0 Specifications: Pathlength: 25 cm.  Wavelength: 660 nm; Bandwidth ~20.  Time constant: 0.167 seconds.  Temperature Error: 0.02 percent F.S./deg C.  Rated depth:  600 meters.  Temperature range: 0 to 30 deg C..  Auxiliary Sensor Volt 1 Manufacturer: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 1 Model: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 1 Serial Number: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 1 Specifications: NONE.  Auxiliary Sensor Volt 2 Manufacturer: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 2 Model: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 2 Serial Number: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 2 Specifications: NONE.  Auxiliary Sensor Volt 3 Manufacturer: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 3 Model: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 3 Serial Number: NONE, Auxiliary Sensor Volt 3 Specifications: NONE.              Resource Description: HI0611_MAR###.cnv       </supplinf>   </descript>   <timeperd>    <timeinfo>     <rngdates>      <begdate>             20060907           </begdate>      <enddate>
